node.title: Pittsburgh police looking for suspects after student shot on school van
node.description: The injured student, identified as a 15-year-old boy, is in critical condition, police said.
node.content: ["Pittsburgh police are searching for two suspects after a 15-year-old was shot in a school van just before dismissal, police said Wednesday. The student is in critical condition at a local hospital.\u00a0", "Police said the shooter walked up to the van, which was parked outside of Pittsburgh Oliver Citywide Academy, and shot into it around 1:30 p.m. The only two people on the van were the student and the driver, officials said at a news conference.\u00a0", "The victim is believed to have been shot twice in the chest area, police said. He was taken to Allegheny General Hospital where he is currently in surgery. The driver was not injured, police said.", "All students were brought inside and the school was placed on lockdown while police searched the area for the suspects, who are considered armed and dangerous. Police said the suspects left the area, and they believe they know the direction in which they fled.", "The school reopened and police were clearing the scene just after 3 p.m., Pittsburgh Public Safety\u00a0tweeted.", "Police described the suspects as being two young males dressed in dark clothing and masks. Police believe the weapon used in the shooting was a handgun.", "At this time it is not clear if the victim and the suspects had any sort of relationship, or if the victim was targeted. Police said they are speaking to witnesses and reviewing video from nearby buildings.", "Senator Bob Casey tweeted that he is \"following this horrible situation closely and my team has reached out to local officials to offer support.\"", "Sophie Reardon is a News Editor at CBS News. Reach her at sophie.reardon@viacomcbs.com"]
